title: Exploited in Devon: Episode 206
description:
It was just a chance meeting on a train. But following the conversation, Stuart Hodgkins knew that he could exploit his new friend for money. And he did just that, moving in that very day.

But nobody could have predicted just what happened when the money ran out....
